Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 111th/Michigan
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, 112th, State, 111th, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, 111th, State, 113th and Michigan: due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 111th/Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, 112th, State, 111th, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, 111th, State, 113th and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Jefferson Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
